item.title: eSports scholarships: Top priority with the National Association of Collegiate eSports launch
item.description:
At the end of last week, on September 7th, the National Association of Collegiate eSports was officially launched in United States of America with the main purpose of legitimizing eSports on the institutional level.

Click here to read the full article.
item.author: info@gosugamers.net (Andreea "divushka" Esanu)
item.dc:creator: Andreea "divushka" Esanu
item.content:encoded:
At the end of last week, on September 7th, the National Association of Collegiate eSports was officially launched in United States of America with the main purpose of legitimizing eSports on the institutional level.

Click here to read the full article.

item.title: IMay go from LSPL to Worlds in a few short months
item.description:
IMay are the first Chinese team to start from LSPL and end up with the third seed into the Worlds just a few months later.

Click here to read the full article.
item.author: info@gosugamers.net (Tim "Fatal1tim" Masters)

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Dota2, CSGO, LOL and many more featured at Persian Gulf Cup this September
item.description:
Despite the difficulties and limitations of eSports in Iran, some great events were organized during this summer to provide Iranian gamers opportunities to gain competitive experience and the chance of participating at LAN events.

Click here to read the full article.
